== Eruvatti (CT) (627280) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Eruvatti (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 10.41 sq. km. and harbouring 3911 households with total population of 16905 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 500 km. Male population is 7769 and female population is 9136. Scheduled Caste population is 202 and Scheduled Tribes population is 45. Census Location Code of the town is 627280<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (Population 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 77 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 77 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 10 km.
